title: What are these? WAARGHbobo?
body:
So I was researching the Freljord and especially True Ice Artifacts.. I found this image and I couldnt quite tell the function of most of these items.

The First seems to be some kind of an Orb, sometimes used by witches to scry( Gather visions of the future?)
The Second item looks like it could be a True Ice lantern or maybe even necklace?The dark Priest in ,,Eye of the Abyss“ wore one!
The Last item I find very curious and I couldnt think of any function for it.. I wonder what it is, tho it oddly looks like a dream catcher from true ice.. :/

Lissandra always talks about True Ice artifacts and Secrets frozen in ice, so naturally Im quite interested in the Items she posesses!
Thanks for any input :)

{{item:3112}} {{item:3312}} {{item:3110}} Some of these lore items look like previously established game items

I actually think that these are not necessarily canon designs of any in-game items like Guardian's Orb or FQ's Claim, as theorized in other comments.

Remember that the Freljord is huge and rich of history and culture, just as there were many, many iceborn warriors, of which not few wielded True Ice weapons.
So, there are probably enough True Ice artifacts and weapons so these wouldn't have to be related to any of the ones that exist in the game (Be it Frozen Heart, Iceborn Gauntlet, Boneshiver or Armguard), even if there are functional or visual similarities.

Just to give an example, in the recently-released story, [_The Eye in the Abyss_](https://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/story/the-eye-in-the-abyss/), we're told of three True Ice weapons that we weren't familiar with before, both as readers _and_ players: _Thunderchild, Bloodfang_ and _Bloodclaw._
